DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No indicator that asks whether there was proir use of sorafenib

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the prior use of sorafenib

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A synthetic compound targeting growth signaling and angiogenesis. Sorafenib blocks the enzyme RAF kinase, a critical component of the RAF/MEK/ERK signaling pathway that controls cell division and proliferation; in addition, sorafenib inhibits the VEGFR-2/PDGFR-beta signaling cascade, thereby blocking tumor angiogenesis.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A synthetic compound targeting growth signaling and angiogenesis. Sorafenib blocks the enzyme RAF kinase, a critical component of the RAF/MEK/ERK signaling pathway that controls cell division and proliferation; in addition, sorafenib inhibits the VEGFR-2/PDGFR-beta signaling cascade, thereby blocking tumor angiogenesis.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior treatment with a multi-kinase inhibitor such as sorafenib or sunitinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior treatment with Sunitinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received less than or equal to 60 days of Sorafenib and has not experienced any grade 3 or 4 toxicity due to Sorafenib?
